text: Do Patti () is an Indian Hindi-language thriller movie directed by Shashanka Chaturvedi and written by Kanika Dhillon. Produced under Kathha Pictures and Blue Butterfly Films, the movie stars Kajol, Kriti Sanon and Shaheer Sheikh. It premiered on Netflix on 25 October 2024. == Cast == * Kajol * Kriti Sanon * Shaheer Sheikh * Tanvi Azmi * Brijendra Kala * Vivek Mushran * Prachee Shah Paandya == Production == In July 2023, The movie was announced on Netflix, starring Kajol and Kriti Sanon in the lead which would mark their second collaboration after the movie Dilwale (2015). Principal photography commenced in August 2023. In October 2023, Shaheer Sheikh joined the cast of the movie. The filming took place in Mumbai, followed by Dehradun before moving on to Manali. Filming was wrapped in December 2023. == Music == == Release == The teaser for the movie was released on 29 February 2024. Do Patti will be released on Netflix on 25 October 2024. == References == ==Other websites== * * * Category:2020s Indian movies
title: Do Patti
